alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 08 at 7:35AM EDT until October 08 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility of less than one mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Hendry, Inland Collier County and Inland Broward County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Drivers, especially those along Interstate 75, must exercise extreme caution while driving in fog. Reports from the Florida Highway Patrol indicate that the areas with the greatest visibility impacts due to dense fog are along Interstate 75 west of mile marker 45.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County
